actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay a judgment in favor of the Grand River Band of Ottawa Indians in Indian Claims Commission docket numbered 40-K.

summary.text: Provides for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay a judgement in favor of the Grand River Band of Ottawa Indians in Indian Claims Commission docket numbered 40-K. Authorizes the Secretary to prescribe rules and regulations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay a judgment in favor of the Grand River Band of Ottawa Indians in Indian Claims Commission docket numbered 40-K.
